thread.section_title: MirrorMate Frames Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MirrorMate Frames | mirrormate.com
thread.title: Kimberly

author: Kimberly
title: Kimberly
text: The experience could have been easier but I was impatient once I saw the beautiful frame. We put it together without too much hassle and the problem we had was the lights hung a little low so we had to figure out how to get it under the lights. My friend took the lights apart and the other problem was taking the tape off the back because that is really the glue. Once we took the tape off and put it up, it was up there, and I mean up there. It is so pretty in the guess bathroom can't wait to do the master bathroom!!!
